Sentencas: This paper presents the work on a simple, natural gas-fed, hybrid solid oxide fuel cell-gas turbine (SOFC-GT) power-generation system.
Titulo: Modelling of simple hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: The system consists of an internal-reforming SOFC (IRSOFC) stack, a combustor, a GT, two compressors and three recuperators.
Titulo: Modelling of simple hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: Two case studies are conducted with particular attention on the effects of operating pressure and fuel flow-rate on the performance of the components and overall system.
Titulo: Modelling of simple hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: Results show that an internal-reforming hybrid SOFC-GT system can achieve an electrical efficiency of more than 60% and a system efficiency (including waste heat recovery for co-generation) of more than 80%.
Titulo: Modelling of simple hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: It is also found that increasing the operating pressure will improve the system efficiency, whereas increasing the fuel flow-rate (while keeping the fuel utilisation rate unchanged) causes the system efficiency to decrease.
Titulo: Modelling of simple hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine power plant

Sentencas: In the latter case, the increase in system fuel consumption is relatively higher which removes the benefit of increase in SOFC stack and turbine power output.
Titulo: Modelling of simple hybrid solid oxide fuel cell and gas turbine power plant
